dunkirk.title: Dunkirk
dunkirk.subtitle: Dunkirk
dunkirk.description: Miraculous evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, Britain, Canada, and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbor of Dunkirk, France, during the Battle of France in World War II.

interstellar.title: Interstellar
interstellar.subtitle: Interstellar
interstellar.description: Interstellar chronicles the adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.

the-dark-knight-rises.title: The Dark Knight Rises
the-dark-knight-rises.subtitle: TDKR
the-dark-knight-rises.description: Batman encounters the mysterious Selina Kyle and the villainous Bane, a new terrorist leader who overwhelms Gotham"s finest. The Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

inception.title: Inception
inception.subtitle: Inception
inception.description: Cobb, a skilled thief is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible: "inception", the implantation of another person"s idea into a target"s subconscious.

the-prestige.title: The Prestige
the-prestige.subtitle: Prestige
the-prestige.description: A mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a life-long battle for supremacy - to create the ultimate illusion whilst sacrificing everything they have to outwit the other.
